sourcesContent:
// vant组件按需导入
import Vue from 'vue'

import { Icon, Grid, GridItem, Lazyload, Swipe, SwipeItem, Search, Toast, NavBar, Tabbar, TabbarItem } from 'vant'
Vue.use(Icon)
Vue.use(Grid)
Vue.use(GridItem)
Vue.use(Lazyload)
Vue.use(SwipeItem)
Vue.use(Swipe)
Vue.use(Search)
Vue.use(Toast)
Vue.use(NavBar)
Vue.use(TabbarItem)
Vue.use(Tabbar)
